title: Lie to Me
description: A job restoring a boat with RD, a hot college guy, becomes Cassie’s anchor during her summer from hell. When everything goes wrong, RD’s touch is the only thing that feels right. But RD’s secrets run deeper than Cassie can imagine and soon she is adrift in his arms and a sea of lies. Seeing RD on the water that day made everything that happened next between us feel like destiny. Like I couldn’t have stopped it even if I’d wanted to. Somehow we were meant to be.
author: Suzanne Brahm
